#include<stdio.h>
 
int main()
{
    int t,i,max,index;
    char s[1001],fre;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        max = -1;
        int count[27]={0}; //[0] for a, [1] for b and so on
        scanf("%s",s);
        for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++){
            count[ s[i]-97 ]++;
        }
        for(i=26;i>=0;i--){
            if(count[i]>=max){
                max = count[i];
                index = i;
            }
        }
        fre = index + 97; //changing to character
        for(i=0; s[i]!='\0' ;i++){
            if(s[i] == fre)
                s[i] = '?';
        }
        printf("%s\n",s);
 
    }
 
    return 0;
}
